text: Henry F. Jim Miller (February 19, 1908 – February 10, 1965) was an American football halfback who played two seasons with the Brooklyn Dodgers of the National Football League. He played college football at West Virginia Wesleyan College and attended Sharpsburg High School in Sharpsburg, Pennsylvania. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats Category:1908 births Category:1965 deaths Category:Players of American football from Pennsylvania Category:American football halfbacks Category:West Virginia Wesleyan Bobcats football players Category:Brooklyn Dodgers (NFL) players Category:People from Sharpsburg, Pennsylvania
title: Jim Miller (halfback)
